body_html: So i have split tf_core_kernels in two, the errors are gone. Other tools now fail like transform_graph. But the problem is obvious. Tensorflow in this shape is a monster. Need to be split in several dlls to reduce these issues. Will see more these days, but the transform graph pdb is 3gb on my machine
